column3: â€œI'm really surprised more people haven't reviewed this strain! Blue Dream x Girl Scout Cookies couldn't be a more perfect cross. It's super yummy too, leaving a noticeable sugary taste in your mouth.Two strains renowned for their pain reliving effects and euphoric happiness combine to create a powerhouse flower. This is one of those strains that makes you happy to be alive. Great for depression, stress, and pain. It ...â€

â€œThis strain is exceptional for both medical and recreational use. I personally haven't had many strains where the best of both strains crossed manifests in the new flower, this is the exception. The blue dream portion comes through *amazingly* on this strain. But because of that, I wouldn't recommend this strain for people that are uncomfortable with strong psychedelic effects. This strain starts you off with a dream...â€
â€œGood strain for me. Really takes away the stress of the day. I actually feel some pain relief in my shoulder as well. Thanks to Ermont Dispensary in Quincy MA.â€

â€œI was told of the extraordinary taste and indica effects so I grew a clone.  I enjoyed this so much I regret not cloning it before it flowered.  It tastes like pie and leaves a sweet taste on my tongue and teeth.  It is strong, a guy I met in the woods on a hike asked for some meds so I shared a bowl with him.  Turns out he's a grower and it blew him away after one hit!  Said he was fine so I just smiled and finished...â€

â€œBlueberry Pie gave me a feeling of full-body relaxation that i've never experienced with any other strain. Any pain i had was numbed and any worries I had were alleviated, I felt so at peace with my body and thankfully I've only ever smoked this strain right before bed, and it results in the best nights sleep of your life. pretty potent so consume with caution but its a great body high.â€
â€œThis is FIRE all day long . The few times I've seen it , I pick it up. Always happy & relieved of my ailments. You will be happy you tried some.â€

â€œmmmmm so tasty, really tastes like blueberry pie which is crazy lol. really like euphoric high, not too heavy, yet still relaxing. puts a nice smile on my face. tho a hybrid, a great social strain for the night time.â€

â€œa strain thats true to the name. smells just like blueberry pie filling and its effect are awesome. great head high at first then before you know the girl scout kush feeling has you. great strain to keep an eye out id you like blueberry and purpsâ€

â€œWorks great for my tension migraines, it helps me numb the pain enough to function . I have severe migraines and have taken strong prescription medication that may or may not work all the time and leaves me feeling loopy the next day. I've gotten off all migraine meds thanks to the medicinal high of blue dream.â€

â€œNot going to waste anyone's time here all you need to know about this Hybrid strain is it's lineage.
Parent #1: Blue Dream
Parent #2: Girl Scout Cookies
A slice of this pie will never disappoint!!
ENJOYâ€

â€œNeed to get rid of some stress? Blueberry pie is the way to go! A nice smooth smoke with a hint of sweetness, Blueberry Pie is a great way to end the day! One of the biggest triggers for seizures is stress, and Blueberry Pie is a great way to control my stress and ease my seizures! While it doesn't do much to help with my pain, this strain is a definite necessity that improves the quality of my everyday life! Everyon...â€

â€œGreat strain! This was the first time I tried BP, it was the first smoke of the day so I was able to feel where BP was most effective for medical  and a wonderful, full active high for recreational. All in All very nice taste, smooth and easy. Def adding to my fav list.â€

â€œSolid hybrid, BD x GSC, can def see the looks of the blueberry w/haze kinda unique smell n taste.  Kinda has the Durban funk, with haze n blueberry bud structure, so cld b betr, but a great simple idea...gotta give em time to sex it up as much as possible aka backcrossing..â€

â€œGreat strain! The euphoria starts right away and body feels like a soft pillow covered in satin. your mood begans to uplift and you become happy and cheerful. Pain begins to ease and you feel very comfortable. A must try and a major must strain to have. You could sleep on this or stay up and get creative. Great for stress, insomnia, and pain.â€

â€œI should start off by saying I deal with severe pain during my periods and am usually at a point where I can't function beyond simply crying and clutching at my body. I have tried so many different strains to touch the pain in my back/uterus and nothing has ever worked like this. This doesn't play up my extreme emotions or cause me to have anxiety, I can genuinely relax and lay back without any pain. However it does ...â€
â€œblue berry pie has won my heart the pain relief and uplifting feeling is the best I've ever felt from any other strain highly recommend thisâ€

â€œone of the best strains on the planet including size, taste, Terps profile, the density, the colorfulness and deep purple hues. Verry smooth and VERY STONG MIND AND BODY; MAKING BLUEBERRY PIE, one of my favs.......â€
â€œthis is a perfect balance of peace and energyâ€

â€œI was really good it put me all my ass and my friends.. I was got some purple punch I believe thatâ€™s what it was called that strain was pretty damn good... crystal ğŸ’ğŸ¼â€â™€ï¸ hooked me up I will always what her service if it was up to me ğŸ’¯ğŸ’¯ I would go back ğŸ‘ŒğŸ½ğŸ’ğŸ½â€â™€ï¸â€

â€œSolid hybrid, BD x GSC, can def see the looks of the blueberry w/haze kinda unique smell n taste.  Kinda has the Durban funk, with haze n blueberry bud structure, so cld b betr, but a great simple idea...gotta give em time to sex it up as much as possible aka backcrossing..â€
â€œWow the taste was incredible. Talking about blueberry taste just like Blueberry. â™¥ï¸â™¥ï¸â™¥ï¸ itâ€
â€œblue berry pie has won my heart the pain relief and uplifting feeling is the best I've ever felt from any other strain highly recommend thisâ€

smell: â­â­â­â­â­
Great for daytime medicating, when your on the move....â€
â€œThis made me really lazy and tired. I was definitely in a good mood and it gave me an appetite.â€

â€œVery very nice. Power is not too tooo tooo strong but gets you to a great place and eases you up.  Very relaxing yet clear head. Not sativa like though.  Nice for a movie or chilling with amigos.â€
â€œa very strong uplifting high. loving every second!â€
â€œIts the perfect combination of my 2 favorite strains. I want to shake the hand of the guy who decided to breed Blue Dream and GSC. find some close to you and go try it.â€
â€œGood cerebral buzz and head high that is oddly distracting enough to make my back pain go away!â€
â€œAmazing!!! Has definitely a blueberry pie smell. It very strong and you feel the affects immediately the taste is sugar and sweet. Puts you to sleep for.â€
â€œseriously great strain... highly recommend it for depressionâ€
â€œmainly felt around the eyes and nose.  more like High mids. Stuffy nose itchy eyes. Not horrible but would not buy again with so many different much better strains available.  Nothing special.â€

â€œThis is great bud.  It has helped me so much with the chronic pain, depression, anxiety.   I'm able to go to yoga and run errands (no driving of course) while functioning absolutely fine but I can relax and sleep great.  Nice high that lasts quite awhile for me.  Highly recommend. I both smoke and vaporize this.  I've also bought hash with blueberry pie kief and had the same pleasant experiences.â€
â€œIn love the colorful hues of purple all through this amazing tasting herbal Medicine. in my top 5 of favs.â€
â€œMy favorite strain so far, uplifting and happy; great for all the time but acceptable for bed as well. Not as heavy as a master kush high, but just about there, with a clearer head.â€

â€œWonderful terp tase of Blueberry,  with an exhale aftertaste of Blueberry pie crust.  The effects are verry motiving an at times sedative.  Deppendsbon the length of flowerb time.... All in all verry good and onebif my Favesbof it parents.. ..â€
â€œLove the look, the smell, and the taste. The buzz is also very pleasant. I love this in the daytime.â€
â€œFrom the first real harvest this was the best tasting plant by far, had such a sweet berry flavor and it wasn't the most potent but the terps made up for it.â€
â€œa very good strain! very energizing and a good happy/goofy high!â€

â€œDefinitely a good body buzz with your head in the clouds. Only complaint is that the smoke felt a lot harsher on my throats for some reason than the normal light sativa I normally smoke. Smoke on brothers and sisters! âœŒï¸â€
â€œgreat smell & taste, every hit is smooth and sweet. I'd recommend for any smokerâ€
â€œTo the mad scientist who created this I say .....Well played, well played.â€

â€œi think i prefer the two cross strains for blueberry pie on their own, but while smoking a joint of this strain with flu-like symptoms, the taste of this powered through and the pain subsided a bit. 

i'll write another review of this when i feel better. i'd give girl scout cookies a 5 and blue dream a 5, this was a strong 4-4.5 for me.â€

â€œIt's absolutely terrific, it's very sweet tasting and the crystals are dominantly covering the flower. totally mellow and numbing for all the right reasons. I put this strain in my top 5 easy, nice job!!!â€

â€œOkay, this one makes me happy and hungry. And I feel energized in a way. So, this is good because I have zero appetite, and the only way I can enjoy or even want to eat food is if I have weed that gives me the munchies.  I have to remember to be careful of too many munchies.â€
â€œDef a good indica to make you not give a shit and help you sleepâ€
â€œ2 of my favorites come together and make for a perfect end to a rough day. Something bothering you? After this, you will not care. Great flavor of concentrate and a smooth hit with a great high.â€

â€œabsolutely love this strain. picked some up yesterday when I saw ermont had it on the menu. being a bodybuilder I defiently deal with muscle and joint pains. this strain is great for receiving my aches. a must try in my books!!â€

â€œFirst whiff smells somewhat piney or minty but also has a strong underlying sweet scent. After grinding, these same smells become much more pungent.

The buds are tight, dense and covered in trichomes. They have a bright green color with some short light brown and amber hairs. One nug even had a blueish hue to it!

The smoke is tasty and sweet! The inhale is very reminiscent of GSC in it's flavor and the exhale remin...â€

â€œThis is one of my all time favorite strains. It has the sweet smell similar to blue dream, and it tastes just the same. The high is instantly upliftingâ€” regardless of blueberry pie being a hybrid, it feels much more like a sativa. Definitely get this strain if you have the chance!â€

â€œDefinitely a bit of let down but only because of expectation, good blueberry flavor and scent though. Smokes like a heavy handed haze. Mellow and relaxing, seems less potent than either parent but still has a nice well rounded buzz to it. Would like to see a cut that leans a bit more to the GSC side. Found Cookie Wreck to be a better sativa/GSC cross with similar but stronger effects personally. 3.5/5.â€
â€œI love this strain...it didn't hit me immediately but when it did, it was very mellow and relaxing....it's a long lasting buzz..â€
â€œThank. U Ermont in Quincy this is one good strain have me feeling less anxious  and relaxed that horns strain ğŸ˜‚â€

â€œI was gonna give this strainâ­â­â­, but the taste of the terpines are wonderful, but as for the strength of this medicine,could be a Lil higher. All in all this is a very good daytime smoke and allows u to do the things u need to do without the mind racing, and the self induced anxieties, most of us create. I think that's y most of us smokers started smoking in the first place. To elevate stress,make taskes a Lil easier...â€
â€œNot over the top strong but it's a nice buzz that will sooth your mild discomforts...!!!...â€
â€œGot this to help with back pain, but ended up making me feel really tense with a wicked head high. Very baked, but didn't help with pain!â€
